title: Challenging the OSCP, getting free exam (retake) & cracking it the smart way
snippet: TLDR: The mistakes committed and lessons learned in my OSCP journey that I could not find in other blogs and getting a free exam retake. My two cents on the updated OSCP and how it can be cracked in a smart way. The (MX) is to highlight the mistakes I did.Background: I had 4 years of pentest and ...
